summary: Completed comprehensive testing of eSports Tournament System improvements including SMTP endpoints, team tournaments API, sub-games logic, FontAwesome integration, and TeamDetailPage functionality

minor_bugs.issue: Map veto action returns 403 when not part of team in match
minor_bugs.impact: Expected behavior for non-team members, but limits testing

configuration_issues.issue: SMTP not configured (expected - no SMTP credentials provided)
configuration_issues.impact: Email functionality not available but endpoints work correctly

passed_tests: POST /api/admin/smtp-test - Handles test email requests correctly
Sub-games logic: CoD and FIFA have sub-games, CS2 and Valorant have direct maps
Call of Duty game with Black Ops 6 sub-game and proper maps
CoD BO6 4v4 S&D Liga tournament with 8 teams and 7 matchdays
Map veto system endpoints and functionality
TeamDetailPage exists and displays team information
FontAwesome social media icons working (Discord, Twitter, Instagram, Twitch, YouTube, Website)
Team navigation tabs functional (Overview, Members, Sub-Teams, Tournaments)
